comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: Possibly taken on same occasion as: Karl Franz Joseph Ludwig Hubert Georg Otto Marie von Habsburg-Lothringen, AKA Charles I of Austria. (1887-1922) From Wikipedia: "Charles became heir-presumptive with the assassination of Archduke Franz Ferdinand, his uncle, in Sarajevo in 1914, the event which precipitated World War I. Charles succeeded to the thrones in November 1916, when his grand-uncle, Franz Josef I of Austria died. Charles also became a Generalfeldmarschall in the Austro-Hungarian Army." en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Charles_I_of_Austria Also, see Flickr Commons Project notes under: and
